boardgame.name: MarraCash
boardgame.description: Taking on the roles of shop owners in the Moroccan marketplace, players buy various shops, as color-coded tourists in the form of neat little wooden people in hats start showing up at the entry gate. Players can then move them into their own like-colored shops to earn money or move them into opponents' shops for a share of the profits. After all the tourists have been placed onto the board, the player with the biggest bankroll takes the victory. This game combines some great auction elements with spatial relationships for an appealing overall effect._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 game board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 blue auction stone_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 counter sheet with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; - 24 shop signs (6 each of Ali, Anfa, Omar and Leila)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; - 4 player aid cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;24 plastic stands_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;54 pawns = _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;visitors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (14 yellow, 10 each of red, blue, green and purple)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;25 game cards with _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;souvenirs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Money in different values (500, 200, 100 and 25 Dirhams)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

All our games are brand new, some might have their shrink removed to show it to our customers. Combined shipping may be available on multiple purchases, this will save you money. Spellekijn is a brick _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; mortar shop located in Leeuwarden, The Netherlands – we are not someone_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s garage or basement. We offer free open gaming and events to the public at the store and have over 3400 titles in stock (we do not list them all on BGG). You can find them all on our website. You are also free to contact us. International Customers, please ask for your precise shipping costs. Methods of payment: • You can always pick the game up in our local shop :-) • You can make a bank transfer free of charge to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC if your bank account is nominated in EURO. • You can use paypal Euro paypal. (That should be the first choice for non-EU customers) Check our website: www.spellekijn.nl prices may be different on our website due to special BGG offers. Just leave a note and you will receive the lowest price.
